content.rendered:
Matthew Lee, Founder & Head of Business Development from Volition Investment Properties joins us on this week’s panel to discuss cash flowing investment properties, tenants, purchase plus investments, equity and what the future holds for millennial purchasers.

Listen to the Podcast

excerpt.rendered: Matthew Lee, Founder & Head of Business Development from Volition Investment Properties joins us on this week’s panel to discuss cash flowing investment properties, tenants, purchase plus investments, equity and what the future holds for millennial purchasers. Listen to the Podcast
